description:
With a blade optimized for pruning and cutting greenwood, this saw is excellent for doing a bit of trail maintenance as you go. Smooth cutting technology earns the gratitude of following hikers without slowing down your progress.

  • Rust-resistant, taper-ground blade is SK-4 high carbon steel
  • Steel is hard chrome plated to resist the effects of tree resin and wipe clean easily
  • Blade locks securely in 2 open positions: in line with the handle for regular use and slightly angled for flush cutting
  • Impulse-hardened, non-set teeth for cutting efficiency
  • 8 per 30mm tooth count works well for cutting greenwood
  • Non-slip rubber handle
  • Includes clear plastic flip-lock carrying case with belt clip
name: Silky Pocketboy 130 Folding Saw
